items.title: Warwick Ward
items.body: Thanks for checking out my portfolio, I'm an IT Consultant by day working on a wide range of web development projects for clients, side projects, hussels and hobbies are varied and many.

items.title: Home Improvement
items.body: Making my way through a near full property renovation, discovering, learning, failing, designing and enjoying the process. Check out the Instragram feed for some major wins along the way.

items.title: Home Assistant
items.body: I spend way to much time automating and integrating local devices and cloud services into my Home Assistant setup. I enjoy cotributing to the forums and have created a browser extension also.
